original_text: The people heard what Peter said to them. They were very upset. So they said to Peter and the other apostles, ‘Friends, tell us what we should do.’
korean_text: 그들이 이 말을 듣고 마음에 찔려 베드로와 다른 사도들에게 물어 이르되 형제들아 우리가 어찌할꼬 하거늘

sentences.original_text: The people heard what Peter said to them
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 베드로가 그들에게 한 말을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: So they said to Peter and the other apostles
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 베드로와 다른 사도들에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: 'Friends, tell us what we should do'
